title: Honor announces Magic UI 6.0 (Android 12) rollout schedule for the Honor 50 series
content:
Honor unveiled its latest flagship smartphones — the Honor Magic 4 and Honor Magic 4 Pro — at MWC earlier this year. The new devices feature a unique design and top-of-the-line hardware, and they run the latest version of Honor’s Magic UI (Magic UI 6.0) based on Android 12. Magic UI 6.0 packs all the

The post Honor announces Magic UI 6.0 (Android 12) rollout schedule for the Honor 50 series appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Honor has shared the Magic UI 6.0 (Android 12) rollout schedule for the Honor 50 and Honor 50 Lite. Read on to learn when you'll receive the update on your device.
